alert.note: Alert for Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 2:18PM CST until March 09 at 12:23AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following county, Laclede. * WHEN...Until 800 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 216 PM CST, The Department of Transportation reported several roads across the county remain flooded from previous heavy rain in the warned area. - This includes the following low water crossings... Osage Fork at Highway J, Bear Creek at Highway FF, Dry Auglaize Creek at Highway BB, Osage Fork at Auburn Road, North Cobb Creek at Ripley Drive, Mountain Creek at Kinfolk Road and North Cobb Creek at Highway B. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Western Fort Leonard Wood, Lebanon, Richland, Conway, Morgan, Phillipsburg, Stoutland, Bennett Springs, Twin Bridges, Sleeper, Dry Knob, Falcon, Eldridge, Competition, Lynchburg and Bennett Spring State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
